results.content: In itself, I don't believe this is a bad idea.
elo_info: In itself, I don't believe this is a bad idea.

results.content: The problem is the precedent it sets.
elo_info: The problem is the precedent it sets.

results.content: Right now, we as a citizenry are generally pretty adamant about having the rights to control our own bodies.
elo_info: Right now, we as a citizenry are generally pretty adamant about having the rights to control our own bodies.

results.content: The government can physically move your body somewhere like jail, but that's about all we'll let it do.
elo_info: The government can physically move your body somewhere like jail, but that's about all we'll let it do.

results.content: If "all mentally disabled people are to be sterilized" were to be come law tomorrow, it would set the precedent that the government can forcibly sterilize someone.
elo_info: If “all mentally disabled people are to be sterilized” were to be come law tomorrow, it would set the precedent that the government can forcibly sterilize someone.
